eu.wauz.wauzcore.players

Class WauzPlayerRegistrator

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.wauz.wauzcore.players.WauzPlayerRegistrator

  • public class WauzPlayerRegistrator
extends java.lang.Object
    The player registrator is used to initially create/remove/update player information.
    Author:
    Wauzmons

    • Method Detail

      • login

        public static void login(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Handles the join of a player. Updates "name" and "lastplayed" config values + initializes other values for first time players. Resets values like health and saturation and teleports the player to the hub.
        Parameters:
        player - The player that joined.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        See Also:
        WauzPlayerDataPool.regPlayer(Player), CharacterManager.equipHubItems(Player)

      • logout

        public static void logout(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Handles the leave of a player. Deletes all cached values related to that player.
        Parameters:
        player - The player that left.
        See Also:
        WauzPlayerBossBar.clearBar(Player), PlayerConfigurator.setLastPlayed(org.bukkit.OfflinePlayer), CharacterManager.logoutCharacter(Player), WauzPlayerDataPool.unregPlayer(Player)

      • respawn

        public static void respawn(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Handles the respawn of a player. Skips the death screen and shows a "YOU DIED" title instead, while resetting food status effects. The player may respawn in an instance, if max deaths are defined and they are below that value.
        Parameters:
        player - The player that is respawning.
